data.text: The official Ukraine crypto wallets are now accepting donations from the Polkadot (DOT) ecosystem; cofounder Gavin Wood has donated $5.8 million or 298,367 DOT.

data.title: Nvidia Hackers Are Selling Software to Bypass Ethereum Hash Rate Limiter
data.text: The hacker group said it's selling a customized driver that could help miners get around the hash rate limiter installed on Nvidia's high-end gaming cards.
